subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The former Washington State offensive lineman Mike Utley, who was paralyzed in an N.F.L. game, was selected for induction in December into the College Football Hall of Fame.
snippet: The former Washington State offensive lineman Mike Utley, who was paralyzed in an N.F.L. game, was selected for induction in December into the College Football Hall of Fame.
